sub_fields.label: Logo
sub_fields.name: logo
sub_fields.instructions: Recommended to use .svg but beware: SVG files are extremely unsecure as they can contain harmful scripts. Only upload svgs that come from a trusted source!

sub_fields.label: Width
sub_fields.name: width
sub_fields.instructions: The width of the original image in pixels, as svgs don't come with this value.

sub_fields.label: Height
sub_fields.name: height
sub_fields.instructions: The height of the original image in pixels, as svgs don't come with this value.

fields.label: Newsletter signup
fields.name: newsletter_signup
fields.instructions: These are the texts that appear below the newsletter signup forms.

fields.label: Header scripts
fields.name: header_scripts
fields.instructions:
Add scripts like Google analytics, trustpilot, etc. 
Only use trusted scripts as other harmful scripts can cause issues for this site and/or for the user.

fields.label: Footer scripts
fields.name: footer_scripts
fields.instructions: Only use trusted scripts as other harmful scripts can cause issues for this site and/or for the user.

fields.message: Texts that appear above the navigation in the Start page.
